entity.name: activity
entity.query: SELECT iati_synchroniser_dataset.name AS name, title, filetype, date_created, date_updated, last_found_in_registry, iati_version, source_url, iati_synchroniser_publisher.publisher_iati_id AS publisher_iati_id, iati_synchroniser_publisher.name AS publisher_name, iati_synchroniser_publisher.display_name AS publisher_display_name, CAST(( SELECT ROW_TO_JSON(publisher_record) AS publisher FROM ( SELECT iati_synchroniser_publisher.publisher_iati_id AS publisher_iati_id, iati_synchroniser_publisher.name AS name, iati_synchroniser_publisher.display_name AS display_name ) AS publisher_record ) AS VARCHAR) FROM iati_synchroniser_dataset, iati_synchroniser_publisher WHERE iati_synchroniser_dataset.publisher_id = iati_synchroniser_publisher.id
